Parameters:

FlagStatus WDT_GetFlagStatus ( u32  WDT_FLAG)

Check whether the specified WDT flag has been set.

Parameters:
WDT_FLAG,:specify the flag to be check. This parameter can be one of the following values:
  • WDT_FLAG_UNDERFLOW : WDT underflow active
  • WDT_FLAG_ERROR : WDT error active
Return values:
SETor RESET

Definition at line 183 of file ht32f5xxxx_wdt.c.

void WDT_HaltConfig ( u32  WDT_Mode)

Configure the WDT to run or halt in sleep and deep sleep1 mode.

Parameters:
WDT_Mode,:This parameter can be one of the following values:
  • MODE0_WDTSHLT_BOTH : WDT runs in sleep and deep sleep1 mode
  • MODE0_WDTSHLT_SLEEP : WDT runs in sleep mode
  • MODE0_WDTSHLT_HALT : WDT halts in sleep and deep sleep1 mode
Return values:
None

void WDT_SetDeltaValue ( u16  WDT_WDTD)

Set delta value of the WDT.

Parameters:
WDT_WDTD: specify the WDT Delta value. This parameter must be a number between 0 and 0x0FFF
Return values:
None

Definition at line 194 of file ht32f5xxxx_wdt.c.

void WDT_SetPrescaler ( u16  WDT_PRESCALER)

Set prescaler value of the WDT.

Parameters:
WDT_PRESCALER,:specify the WDT Prescaler value. This parameter can be one of the following values:
  • WDT_PRESCALER_1 : WDT prescaler set to 1
  • WDT_PRESCALER_2 : WDT prescaler set to 2
  • WDT_PRESCALER_4 : WDT prescaler set to 4
  • WDT_PRESCALER_8 : WDT prescaler set to 8
  • WDT_PRESCALER_16 : WDT prescaler set to 16
  • WDT_PRESCALER_32 : WDT prescaler set to 32
  • WDT_PRESCALER_64 : WDT prescaler set to 64
  • WDT_PRESCALER_128 : WDT prescaler set to 128
Return values:
None

Definition at line 225 of file ht32f5xxxx_wdt.c.

void WDT_SetReloadValue ( u16  WDT_WDTV)

Set reload value of the WDT.

Parameters:
WDT_WDTV: specify the WDT Reload value. This parameter must be a number between 0 and 0x0FFF
Return values:
None

void WDT_SourceConfig ( u32  WDT_SOURCE)

WDT source select.

Parameters:
WDT_SOURCE,:LSI or LSE of the WDT source. This parameter can be one of the following values:
  • WDT_SOURCE_LSI :
  • WDT_SOURCE_LSE :
Return values:
None
